path /v3/xrp/transaction
opid xrptransferblockchain

sum send xrp from address to address

oneof
type object
props
fromaccount
maxlength 34

desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present

destinationtag
desc destination tag of recipient account if any
type integer

path /v3/xrp/account/settings
opid xrpaccountsettings
params None
sum modify xrp account
reqBody
oneof
type object
props
fromaccount
maxlength 34
minlength 33
desc xrp account address must be the one used for generating deposit tags
type string
fromsecret
maxlength 29
minlength 29
desc secret for account secret or signature id must be present
type string
fee
desc fee to be paid in xrp if omitted current fee will be calculated
pattern ddd
type string
rippling
desc should be true if an account is the issuer of assets
type boolean
requiredestinationtag
desc should be true if an account should support offchain processing
type boolean
required
fromaccount
fromsecret
schName accountsettingsxrpblockchain
type object
props
fromaccount
maxlength 34
minlength 33
desc xrp account address must be the one used for generating deposit tags
type string
signatureid
type string
format uuid
desc identifier of the private key associated in signing application secret or signature id must be present
fee
desc fee to be paid in xrp if omitted current fee will be calculated
pattern ddd
type string
rippling
desc should be true if an account is the issuer of assets
type boolean
requiredestinationtag
desc should be true if an account should support offchain processing
type boolean
required
fromaccount
signatureid
schName accountsettingsxrpblockchainkms
path /v3/xrp/broadcast
opid xrpbroadcast
params None
sum broadcast signed xrp transaction
reqBody
schema broadcastkms
props
txdata
desc raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
signatureid
desc id of prepared payment template to sign required only when broadcasting transaction signed by tatum kms
format uuid
type string
index
desc only if the signature id is mnemonicbased and you run kms v62 or later the index of the address to send the assets from that was generated from the mnemonic
type number
minimum 0
maximum 2147483647
required
txdata
type object
